original_text: “The owner’s servants came to him and said, ‘Sir, didn’t you sow good seed in your field? Where then did the weeds come from?’
korean_text: 집 주인의 종들이 와서 말하되 주여 밭에 좋은 씨를 뿌리지 아니하였나이까 그런데 가라지가 어디서 생겼나이까

sentences.original_text: The owner's servants came to him
Sir, didn't you sow good seed in your field?
sentences.korean_translation: 주인님, 밭에 좋은 씨를 뿌리지 아니하였나이까?

sentences.original_text: Where then did the weeds come from?
